articles.title: TBZ Q4 results: Net profit jumps 3-fold to Rs 9 cr - Economic Times
articles.description: Net income rose to Rs 369.46 crore in the fourth quarter of 2020-21 from Rs 343.57 crore in the year-ago period.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: Jewellery firm (TBZL) on Monday posted a more than three-fold jump in consolidated net profit at Rs 9.36 crore for the fourth quarter of the 2020-21 fiscal on higher income.
